name: An Abrupt Turn in the Forest Path
description: The forest path turns abruptly here, heading north and east. A large, 4' tall stone stands higher than the long grass at the edges of the path. It is engraved with a runic symbol.

features.look: It's a dirt path, slowly being overtaken by encroaching weeds. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time.
The stone is standing alongside the path. The way it's oriented is almost like a signpost. The runic symbol seems to indicate what lies to the east.
